name: GlitchTip
description: An open source reimplementation of Sentry error tracking platform

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default from email address. Example info@example.com

EMAIL_URL.description: SMTP string. It will look something like smtp://email@:password@smtp_url:port

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: Alternatively, use the Mailgun API for email

MAILGUN_SENDER_DOMAIN.description: If you are using a specific Mailgun sender domain that is different from your messages’ from_email domains, set this to the domain you’ve configured in your Mailgun account.

EMAIL_BACKEND.description: If using mailgun, set to anymail.backends.mailgun.EmailBackend

GLITCHTIP_MAX_EVENT_LIFE_DAYS.description: (Default 90) Events and associated data older than this will be deleted from the database.

ENABLE_OPEN_USER_REGISTRATION.description: Set to True to allow any user to register new organizations.

GLITCHTIP_DOMAIN.description: Set to your domain. Include scheme (http or https). Example: https://glitchtip.example.com.
